AnimationEffect.summary: The AnimationEffect interface of the Web Animations API is an interface representing animation effects.

remarks.para: AnimationEffect is an abstract interface and so isn't directly instantiable. However, concrete interfaces such as inherit from it, and instances of these interfaces can be passed to objects for playing, and may also be used by CSS Animations and Transitions.

AnimationEffectGetComputedTiming.summary: The getComputedTiming() method of the interface returns the calculated timing properties for this animation effect.

blockquote.para: These values are comparable to the computed styles of an Element returned using window.getComputedStyle(elem).

AnimationEffectGetTiming.summary: The AnimationEffect.getTiming() method of the interface returns an object containing the timing properties for the Animation Effect.

blockquote.para: Several of the timing properties returned by getTiming() may take on the placeholder value "auto". To obtain resolved values for use in timing computations, instead use .
In the future, "auto" or similar values might be added to the types of more timing properties, and new types of might resolve "auto" to different values.

AnimationEffectGetTiming.returns: An object containing the following properties:

AnimationEffectUpdateTiming.summary: The updateTiming() method of the interface updates the specified timing properties for an animation effect.
